items.name: Big
items.desc: This alcohol-free IPA brewed with Citra hops radiates big citrus fruit aromas. The bright, sharp twist of bitterness on the end makes you want to dive back for more. 0.5% ABV.

items.name: Horses
items.desc: This ode to the beer style that changed everything is brewed with rye and Vienna grains along with Centennial, Chinook, Columbus and Cascade hops for a dry, peppery malt-profile and aromas of grapefruit, pine sap and Seville marmalade.

items.name: Oliver's
items.desc: Sparkling Medium Fine Perry Pale, wheat yellow colour with gentle sparkle. Aroma of pineapple, elderflower and mixed citrus. Taste of sweet fruitiness and tangy citrus with flavours of pineapple chunks, ripe melon and lychee. Tasty finish and mouthfeel Fermented with wild yeasts

items.name: Parade
items.desc: Saturated in Citra, Mosaic and Idaho-7, this 6% IPA is brimming with fruit bubblegum flavours of mango, orange peel, pineapple and ripe flat peaches. There are a limited number of cases of this beer and so we don't expect it to hang around for long.

items.name: Strangers
items.desc: A real juicy 5% IPA brewed with London Fog yeast, Mosaic, Sabro and Idaho-7 hops, along with oats, dextrin, CaraGold and Maris Otter. It's pithy, chewy, dank and resinous in all the right places with big bouncy flavours of pineapple, white grape, lemongrass and grapefruit â€“ with a faint whiff of strawberries and cream. Believe it!
